name: infra-2-builder-split
description: Infrastructure task (9 config/CI files) decomposed into 2 builders with non-overlapping scopes: config-builder (package.json, tsconfig, biome, gitignore, changelog) and cicd-builder (workflows, version-bump, release command). Scouts skipped — SPEC.md provided complete file specifications. Self-verified both diffs against spec rather than spawning reviewers (simple config files, no runnable quality gates). Builders tend to modify .mulch/ files outside scope — flag for merger to handle selectively.
